verses.roman:
vṛkṣa-ḍāle śuka-śārī dila daraśana
tāhā dekhi' prabhura kichu śunite haila mana

synonyms: vṛkṣa-ḍāle—on a branch of a tree; śuka-śārī—male and female parrots; dila—gave; daraśana—appearance; tāhā dekhi'-seeing that; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kichu—something; śunite—to hear; haila—there was; mana—mind.
translation: When a male and female parrot appeared on the branches of a tree, the Lord saw them and wanted to hear them speak.
